value:
$WmMPID_冬祭サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_WinterFes17,Face|Oh-ho-ho... So happy...we're
spending the winter festival together,
just the two of us...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_WinterFes17,Face|Uh, Tharja... This is a tournament.
Our opponents are here, in fact.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_WinterFes17,Face|It seems like just yesterday I wanted
to hex all of those cute couples at
the festival...each and every one...$k$pSomething changed my mind this
year. It must be because I'm so
happy!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_WinterFes17,Face|Tharja? Are you listening to me?
Tharja?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_WinterFes17,Face|For getting in the way of my "normal
practice," I'll curse each and every
one of you!$k$pUh... No. That's not right. What I
meant to say was... Let's all celebrate
together!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_WinterFes17,Face|Tharja... Are you feeling OK?$k$pWe had better retreat for now and
meet up with Chrom and Lissa. Come
on.$k$p$Sbs150|
